subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
Camps and Camping
Parks and Other Recreation Areas
lead_paragraph: The idea of establishing a path on water may seem odd. But it hasn’t stopped the states of Washington and Maine, among other entities, from building extensive water trail systems.
snippet: The idea of establishing a path on water may seem odd. But it hasn’t stopped the states of Washington and Maine, among other entities, from building extensive water trail systems.
